solution_line_template: First find how long Carly runs the second week: {initial_miles_week1} miles * {twice_factor} + {extra_miles} = <<{initial_miles_week1}*{twice_factor}+{extra_miles}={miles_week2}>>{miles_week2} miles.
Then find how long she runs in the third week: {fraction_week3} * {miles_week2} miles = <<{fraction_week3}*{miles_week2}={miles_week3}>>{miles_week3} miles.

Then subtract the {reduction_miles} miles reduction from when she was injured: {miles_week3} miles - {reduction_miles} miles = <<{miles_week3}-{reduction_miles}={miles_injured_week}>>{miles_injured_week} miles.
